About me...

I'm currently studying computer engineering at the University of Waterloo in Waterloo, Ontario, Canada.
My workstation is an aluminum unibody Macbook Pro. I use Coda, CSS Edit and Transmit for Web development and Xcode for C/C++ development. I use Eclipse for Java Development. I have a passion for minimalistic design and typography!
In the past I have worked as a Web Developer for the City of Waterloo, the Bank of Montreal and Research In Motion.
I specialize in both front and back end development. I am currently available for hire.
